item.title: 317 Update Server - Offer
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:8, topic:398408”][quote author=sinisoul link=topic=495543.msg3623060#msg3623060 date=1307598635]

I don’t really get the question, its a video of a client loading?

Its a real 317 update server, the cache was being sent via the normal protocol and the idiot way of sending the cache then unzipping it. This is how REAL rs updates it self, very few servers around with this feature.

If you didn’t understand that, then I have no hope for you.

I believe Hyperion comes with it.

JAGGRAB, not the update server
[/quote]

Oh, the whole “ondemand” stuff?[/quote]

…yeah.

Read full topic
